posts.message:
OPEN DOOR EGYPT HAS BEEN POSTPONED. 

We regret to inform you that due to unforeseen circumstances and the current security situation in Egypt, we have decided to postpone the Microsoft Egypt Open Door event that was scheduled to take place on November 29th and 30th at the Fairmont Hotel. 

We will keep you informed about the new dates as soon as these are finalized. Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience caused. 

We appreciate your support and understanding.

Microsoft Egypt
